name: test_e2e_with_logs[057_XSS_REFL_008]
description:

| **Pattern ID** | `XSS_REFL_008` |
| **Name** | Textarea onfocus XSS |
| **Category** | XSS |
| **Subcategory** | reflected_xss |
| **Severity** | `HIGH` |

## Attack Details

- **Payload**: `<textarea onfocus=alert('XSS') autofocus>`
